job.title: Software Engineer - Delphi, Borland C++, SRS
job.description: If you are a Software Engineer with experience in the Medical Device field please read onbrbrWe are a quickly growing medical device company looking for a Research and Development Software Engineer to join our passionate and energetic teambrbrThe ideal candidate would posses a Bachelors or Masters degree in software engineering or related discipline and 3 to 5 years of experience in software development with emphasis on embedded system and medical devicesbrbrWhat You Will Be DoingbrulliResponsible for software design development coding testing bug fixing and exceeds product requirementsliliMake major and minor modifications and enhancement to existing software designsliliPlans and schedules work assignments and tasks in coordination with overall project objectivesliliGenerate complete concise documentation of the software requirement specifications software design specification and detail design including software codingbrliulWhat You Need for this
